Inside Macintosh: Apple Game Sprockets Guide /
Chapter 4 - NetSprocket / NetSprocket Reference
Data Structures

Address Reference

You use the address reference as a reference to a protocol address.

typedef     struct      NSPAddressPrivate 
*NSpAddressReference;
Field descriptions

NSpAddressReference
An opaque reference to a protocol address. It is created from a call to NSpDoModalJoinDialog or by converting an Open Transport address.
